title: Requirements Gathering
description: Gather and document all functional and non-functional requirements for the FunctionalMacroSystem project.

title: Design Phase Initiation
description: Initiate the design phase by creating high-level architecture and system design for the FunctionalMacroSystem.

title: Library Research and Selection
description: Research existing libraries for functional languages that can be leveraged in the macro system, and select suitable ones.

title: Domain-Specific Language (DSL) Design
description: Design the DSLs for the FunctionalMacroSystem to enable efficient metaprogramming and domain-specific language creation.

title: Macro System Implementation
description: Implement the core macro system based on the design and selected libraries.

title: Unit Testing
description: Write unit tests for the macro system to ensure correct functionality.

title: Integration Testing
description: Perform integration testing to ensure the macro system functions correctly with other parts of the application.

title: Code Review and Refactoring
description: Review the code for quality and refactor as necessary to improve maintainability.

title: Documentation Creation
description: Create clear and concise documentation for the FunctionalMacroSystem, including usage examples.

title: Deployment Planning
description: Plan the deployment of the FunctionalMacroSystem, considering factors such as infrastructure requirements, staging environments, and rollback strategies.
